channel.title: Comments on: Continuing XPages Progress and some lessons learned

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>@1 - It's certainly on the way. I would say by the time we get to 9.0 (or whatever it's called) we should be bordering on world class development platforms.</p>
item.content:encoded: @1 – It’s certainly on the way. I would say by the time we get to 9.0 (or whatever it’s called) we should be bordering on world class development platforms.

item.title: By: Scott Cochrane
item.dc:creator: Scott Cochrane
item.description: <p>Certainly sounds impressive.. is Domino finally a "great" web development platform? <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJ8/$File/shocked.gif"</a> /> </p>
item.content:encoded: Certainly sounds impressive.. is Domino finally a “great” web development platform? http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5N3GJ8/$File/shocked.gif“ />
